info: The standard markup language every web developer must know to create the base of a webpage.
I design responsive applications that adapt seamlessly across devices, while following accessibility and usability best practices.
Experienced with ES6+ features. JavaScript is my primary language for developing dynamic and interactive web applications.
I use TypeScript primarily with React to enforce static typing, reduce runtime errors, and improve code maintainability.
A front-end JavaScript library that I use to build modular, reusable components. This website itself was built with React.
I use Node.js to develop scalable back-end applications, maintaining a unified JavaScript ecosystem across the stack.
A lightweight Node.js framework I use for setting up APIs, handling routes, and managing middleware efficiently.
I use Python alongside Flask for back-end development, offering an alternative to Node.js.
A lightweight Python web framework I use to build flexible and efficient back-end services with minimal overhead.
Middleware for Node.js that allows me to implement authentication strategies like JWTs with ease.
An API testing tool that allows me to send and debug HTTP requests efficiently during API development.
A robust, open-source relational database that I use to structure and manage data efficiently.
A type-safe ORM that simplifies database interactions with an intuitive query API, working seamlessly with PostgreSQL.
Proficient in writing raw SQL queries for CRUD operations before transitioning to ORMs like Prisma (Node.js) and SQLAlchemy (Python).
Explored basics of MongoDB for handling unstructured or flexible-schema data, particularly in experimental or prototype applications.
Version control system for tracking changes in my projects, working seamlessly with GitHub.
A platform I use to manage repositories, collaborate with others, and deploy projects.
Comfortable with standard Bash commands; I use Ubuntu as my primary development environment.
My go-to build tool for React projects, providing fast development and optimized production builds with minimal setup.
Explored Docker to containerize applications and ensure consistent deployment across development and production environments.
Familiar with some essential AWS services such as VPC, EC2, S3, Route53, SES, and RDS.
My preferred IDE for web development, where I maintain a minimal setup for a streamlined workflow.
A JavaScript testing framework I use to write unit and integration tests for React and Node.js applications
I use npm to manage dependencies and automate tasks across my development projects.
A statically typed language I've explored for its simplicity and performance in building efficient microservices and DevOps tooling.
